uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.coregame

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.coregame.Cell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents a single cell (tile) on the board.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Cell

        public Cell(CellType cellType,
            Candy candy,
            int jellyLevel)

      • Cell

        public Cell(CellType cellType,
            Candy candy,
            int jellyLevel,
            boolean isIngredientSink)
        Creates the candy by specifying.
        Parameters:
        cellType - The type of the cell. (Should be non null).
        candy - The candy that will be in the cell (This can be null, but should agree to the cell type).
        jellyLevel - The level of jelly that will be initially on the cell and has to be removed.
        isIngredientSink - Indicates whether the cell will be set to be an ingredient sink.

      • Cell

        public Cell(Cell original)

    • Method Detail

      • setJellyLevel

        public void setJellyLevel(int jellyLevel)
        Sets the jelly level for the cell. Note: This should be used only when constructing the Design.
        Parameters:
        jellyLevel - the number of jellies that should be placed on the cell.

      • setCandy

        public void setCandy(Candy candy)
        Sets the candy to the cell and changes the cell type appropriately.
        Parameters:
        candy - the candy to be set in the cell.

      • getCandy

        public Candy getCandy()
        Function that returns the candy in the cell.
        Returns:
        the candy that is stored in the cell (if there is one).

      • isFillable

        public boolean isFillable()
        Function that returns whether the current cell can be filled. Note: This is not the only condition for the cell to be filled, since the cell should also not have a blocker above it in the board.
        Returns:

      • hasCandy

        public boolean hasCandy()
        Function that returns whether the cell has a candy.
        Returns:
        if the candy is not null.

      • removeCandy

        public void removeCandy()
        Function that removes the candy from a cell.

      • changeCandyType

        public void changeCandyType(CandyType candyType)
        Function that upgrades candy to the type specified.
        Parameters:
        candyType - The new CandyType specified.

      • isMovable

        public boolean isMovable()
        Function that returns whether it is possible to move the contents of the cell.
        Returns:
        whether it is possible to move the contents of the cell.

      • setIngredientSink

        public void setIngredientSink()
        Function that sets this cell to be an ingredient sink.

      • isIngredientSink

        public boolean isIngredientSink()
        Function that checks if this cell is an ingredient sink, meaning that it will consume the ingredients that stay on that cell at a given instance.
        Returns:
        true if this is an ingredient sink.

      • getCellType

        public CellType getCellType()
        Function that returns the CellType of the cell.
        Returns:
        the CellType of the cell, which is guaranteed to be non-null.

      • setCellType

        public void setCellType(CellType cellType)
        Changing the CellType for customisation purposes.
        Parameters:
        cellType - The cellType that will replace the current type of the cell.

      • getJellyLevel

        public int getJellyLevel()
        Function that returns the current jelly level of the cell.
        Returns:
        the current jelly level for the cell.

      • removeJellyLayer

        public boolean removeJellyLayer()
        Function that removes the jelly from the cell and returns whether any jelly was actually removed (i.e. there was jelly to be removed).
        Returns:
        whether jelly was removed.

      • canDropCandy

        public boolean canDropCandy()
        Function that indicates whether the cell is allowed to drop its candy to the levels below.
        Returns:
        whether the cell can drop candy to the cells below.

      • blocksCandies

        public boolean blocksCandies()
        Function that checks whether this cell blacks the candies from falling. This is done when the cell type itself is a blocker or it is stripped candy that has been detonated, meaning that it has to clear the same row where it was detonated.
        Returns:
        whether the cell will allow candies to be dropped through it.
